text: <a href="../1-Chronicles-2-1/" title="1 Chronicles 2:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 These *are* the sons of Israel; Reuben, Simeon, Levi, and Judah, Issachar, and Zebulun,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-2/" title="1 Chronicles 2:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 Dan, Joseph, and Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-3/" title="1 Chronicles 2:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 The sons of Judah; Er, and Onan, and Shelah: *which* three were born unto him of the daughter of Shua the Canaanitess. And Er, the firstborn of Judah, was evil in the sight of the LORD; and he slew him.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-4/" title="1 Chronicles 2:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 And Tamar his daughter in law bare him Pharez and Zerah. All the sons of Judah *were* five.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-5/" title="1 Chronicles 2:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 The sons of Pharez; Hezron, and Hamul.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-6/" title="1 Chronicles 2:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 And the sons of Zerah; Zimri, and Ethan, and Heman, and Calcol, and Dara: five of them in all.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-7/" title="1 Chronicles 2:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 And the sons of Carmi; Achar, the troubler of Israel, who transgressed in the thing accursed.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-8/" title="1 Chronicles 2:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 And the sons of Ethan; Azariah.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-9/" title="1 Chronicles 2:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 The sons also of Hezron, that were born unto him; Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Chelubai.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-10/" title="1 Chronicles 2:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 And Ram begat Amminadab; and Amminadab begat Nahshon, prince of the children of Judah;
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-11/" title="1 Chronicles 2:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 And Nahshon begat Salma, and Salma begat Boaz,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-12/" title="1 Chronicles 2:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 And Boaz begat Obed, and Obed begat Jesse,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-13/" title="1 Chronicles 2:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 And Jesse begat his firstborn Eliab, and Abinadab the second, and Shimma the third,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-14/" title="1 Chronicles 2:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 Nethaneel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-15/" title="1 Chronicles 2:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 Ozem the sixth, David the seventh:

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-16/" title="1 Chronicles 2:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 Whose sisters *were* Zeruiah, and Abigail. And the sons of Zeruiah; Abishai, and Joab, and Asahel, three.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-17/" title="1 Chronicles 2:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 And Abigail bare Amasa: and the father of Amasa *was* Jether the Ishmeelite.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-18/" title="1 Chronicles 2:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 And Caleb the son of Hezron begat *children* of Azubah *his* wife, and of Jerioth: her sons *are* these; Jesher, and Shobab, and Ardon.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-19/" title="1 Chronicles 2:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 And when Azubah was dead, Caleb took unto him Ephrath, which bare him Hur.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-20/" title="1 Chronicles 2:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 And Hur begat Uri, and Uri begat Bezaleel.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-21/" title="1 Chronicles 2:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 And afterward Hezron went in to the daughter of Machir the father of Gilead, whom he married when he *was* threescore years old; and she bare him Segub.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-22/" title="1 Chronicles 2:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 And Segub begat Jair, who had three and twenty cities in the land of Gilead.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-23/" title="1 Chronicles 2:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23 And he took Geshur, and Aram, with the towns of Jair, from them, with Kenath, and the towns thereof, *even* threescore cities. All these *belonged to* the sons of Machir the father of Gilead.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-24/" title="1 Chronicles 2:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24 And after that Hezron was dead in Calebephratah, then Abiah Hezron's wife bare him Ashur the father of Tekoa.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-25/" title="1 Chronicles 2:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25 And the sons of Jerahmeel the firstborn of Hezron were, Ram the firstborn, and Bunah, and Oren, and Ozem, *and* Ahijah.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-26/" title="1 Chronicles 2:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26 Jerahmeel had also another wife, whose name *was* Atarah; she *was* the mother of Onam.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-27/" title="1 Chronicles 2:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27 And the sons of Ram the firstborn of Jerahmeel were, Maaz, and Jamin, and Eker.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-28/" title="1 Chronicles 2:28 KJV verse detail"><span id="30" class="versehover">28 And the sons of Onam were, Shammai, and Jada. And the sons of Shammai; Nadab, and Abishur.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-29/" title="1 Chronicles 2:29 KJV verse detail"><span id="31" class="versehover">29 And the name of the wife of Abishur *was* Abihail, and she bare him Ahban, and Molid.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-30/" title="1 Chronicles 2:30 KJV verse detail"><span id="32" class="versehover">30 And the sons of Nadab; Seled, and Appaim: but Seled died without children.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-31/" title="1 Chronicles 2:31 KJV verse detail"><span id="33" class="versehover">31 And the sons of Appaim; Ishi. And the sons of Ishi; Sheshan. And the children of Sheshan; Ahlai.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-32/" title="1 Chronicles 2:32 KJV verse detail"><span id="34" class="versehover">32 And the sons of Jada the brother of Shammai; Jether, and Jonathan: and Jether died without children.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-33/" title="1 Chronicles 2:33 KJV verse detail"><span id="35" class="versehover">33 And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-34/" title="1 Chronicles 2:34 KJV verse detail"><span id="36" class="versehover">34 Now Sheshan had no sons, but daughters. And Sheshan had a servant, an Egyptian, whose name *was* Jarha.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-35/" title="1 Chronicles 2:35 KJV verse detail"><span id="37" class="versehover">35 And Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his servant to wife; and she bare him Attai.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-36/" title="1 Chronicles 2:36 KJV verse detail"><span id="38" class="versehover">36 And Attai begat Nathan, and Nathan begat Zabad,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-37/" title="1 Chronicles 2:37 KJV verse detail"><span id="39" class="versehover">37 And Zabad begat Ephlal, and Ephlal begat Obed,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-38/" title="1 Chronicles 2:38 KJV verse detail"><span id="40" class="versehover">38 And Obed begat Jehu, and Jehu begat Azariah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-39/" title="1 Chronicles 2:39 KJV verse detail"><span id="41" class="versehover">39 And Azariah begat Helez, and Helez begat Eleasah,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-40/" title="1 Chronicles 2:40 KJV verse detail"><span id="42" class="versehover">40 And Eleasah begat Sisamai, and Sisamai begat Shallum,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-41/" title="1 Chronicles 2:41 KJV verse detail"><span id="43" class="versehover">41 And Shallum begat Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begat Elishama.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-42/" title="1 Chronicles 2:42 KJV verse detail"><span id="44" class="versehover">42 Now the sons of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel *were*, Mesha his firstborn, which was the father of Ziph; and the sons of Mareshah the father of Hebron.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-43/" title="1 Chronicles 2:43 KJV verse detail"><span id="45" class="versehover">43 And the sons of Hebron; Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-44/" title="1 Chronicles 2:44 KJV verse detail"><span id="46" class="versehover">44 And Shema begat Raham, the father of Jorkoam: and Rekem begat Shammai.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-45/" title="1 Chronicles 2:45 KJV verse detail"><span id="47" class="versehover">45 And the son of Shammai *was* Maon: and Maon *was* the father of Bethzur.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-46/" title="1 Chronicles 2:46 KJV verse detail"><span id="48" class="versehover">46 And Ephah, Caleb's concubine, bare Haran, and Moza, and Gazez: and Haran begat Gazez.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-47/" title="1 Chronicles 2:47 KJV verse detail"><span id="49" class="versehover">47 And the sons of Jahdai; Regem, and Jotham, and Geshan, and Pelet, and Ephah, and Shaaph.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-48/" title="1 Chronicles 2:48 KJV verse detail"><span id="50" class="versehover">48 Maachah, Caleb's concubine, bare Sheber, and Tirhanah.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-49/" title="1 Chronicles 2:49 KJV verse detail"><span id="51" class="versehover">49 She bare also Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Machbenah, and the father of Gibea: and the daughter of Caleb *was* Achsah.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-50/" title="1 Chronicles 2:50 KJV verse detail"><span id="52" class="versehover">50 These were the sons of Caleb the son of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah; Shobal the father of Kirjathjearim,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-51/" title="1 Chronicles 2:51 KJV verse detail"><span id="53" class="versehover">51 Salma the father of Bethlehem, Hareph the father of Bethgader.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-52/" title="1 Chronicles 2:52 KJV verse detail"><span id="54" class="versehover">52 And Shobal the father of Kirjathjearim had sons; Haroeh, *and* half of the Manahethites.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-53/" title="1 Chronicles 2:53 KJV verse detail"><span id="55" class="versehover">53 And the families of Kirjathjearim; the Ithrites, and the Puhites, and the Shumathites, and the Mishraites; of them came the Zareathites, and the Eshtaulites.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-54/" title="1 Chronicles 2:54 KJV verse detail"><span id="56" class="versehover">54 The sons of Salma; Bethlehem, and the Netophathites, Ataroth, the house of Joab, and half of the Manahethites, the Zorites.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-2-55/" title="1 Chronicles 2:55 KJV verse detail"><span id="57" class="versehover">55 And the families of the scribes which dwelt at Jabez; the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, *and* Suchathites. These *are* the Kenites that came of Hemath, the father of the house of Rechab.
